infobox.Japanese title:: 花壇あらしの陰謀  (Kadan Arashi no Inbō)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Ran Mouri  Kogoro Mouri  Detective Boys  Ai Haibara  Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri  Rikiya Koyama as Kogoro Mouri  Chafurin as Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi as Wataru Takagi, Genta Kojima  Yukiko Iwai as Ayumi Yoshida  Ikue Otani as Mitsuhiko Tsuburaya  Megumi Hayashibara as Ai Haibara  Sumako Nomura as Toshiko Yamazaki  Hidenari Ugaki as Ryunosuke Okuda  Shiho Kawaragi as Saki Okamura

sections.Trivia:
- The painting in Saki's house is about a sakura scene from The Evening Cherry Blossom Viewing Route on Sumida River.
- The car driven by Saki Okamura is a titanium grey metallic 2007 Daihatsu Mira.
- New "Next Conan's hint" design.
